subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Erick Aybar’s run-scoring single in the 12th inning led the Angels to victory over the Red Sox, winning Game 3 of their division series and keeping their season from ending.
snippet: Erick Aybar’s run-scoring single in the 12th inning led the Angels to victory over the Red Sox, winning Game 3 of their division series and keeping their season from ending.
